name: BambooHR
description: Integrate with BambooHR to list, get, get and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Employees
tools.description: List employees from BambooHR. Returns a directory of all active employees with their basic information.

tools.name: Get Employee
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific BambooHR employee by their ID. Returns fields like name, email, department, job title, hire date, and more.

tools.name: Get Directory
tools.description: Get the full employee directory from BambooHR. Returns a structured list of all employees with department and contact info.

tools.name: Request Time Off
tools.description: Submit a time-off request in BambooHR for a specific employee. Specify the date range and time-off type.

tools.name: List Time Off
tools.description: List time-off requests from BambooHR. Filter by employee, date range, or status.

companyDomain.label: Company Subdomain
companyDomain.description: Your BambooHR company subdomain (e.g. "mycompany" for mycompany.bamboohr.com)
